KNIGHTS OF THE LIBRARY TABLE.
 POTTERVERSE ϟ OPEN PLAYBYS ϟ  JCINK PREMIUM
 This request is for a group of nerds who met at...
caption:
KNIGHTS OF THE LIBRARY TABLE.

POTTERVERSE ϟ OPEN PLAYBYS ϟ  JCINK PREMIUM

This request is for a group of nerds who met at Hogwarts and have since grown up to become… even bigger nerds than they were at school. Character concepts are super flexible! Genders, playbys, ethnicities, etc. are all wide open. There are three active members of this group on site already. Click HERE to learn more!

summary: Harry Potter Supernatural AU part 2
title: Harry Potter Supernatural AU part 2
body:
One day, while classes weren’t going, there was a trickle of music out of Professor Dean Winchester’s office. Harry looks in and sees a record player and professor Castiel standing with Dean, smiling widely.

“Cas, You shouldn’t have.”

“Well, I know you’ve been complaining about not having your music here, and I know it’s not AC/DC, but I fixed up a few old records.”

“Love Potion Number Nine?” Dean picked up a record, smiling, “Are you courting me, Professor Castiel?”

“Dean, I have been since we’ve met.”

Dean played the record, and started dancing.

All Harry could think about-
The fuck is courting?

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

tags: i have very strong feelings about this
this being peter pettigrew and everything surrounding his friendships in the marauders
its now 5:45am and thankfully ive stopped crying.
summary: I'm having one of those moments when you stay up too late (even I have to admit 5:30am is late) and end up sobbing over the...
body:
I’m having one of those moments when you stay up too late (even I have to admit 5:30am is late) and end up sobbing over the fates of fictional characters (in this case, the Marauders, or more specifically: the tragedy of Wormtail’s betrayal) while struggling to not wake up the rest of your household.

The current catalyst for this reaction?

@themischiefmanagers See You Again CMV.

Seriously, amazing editing Chris, I’m not surprised it made Robin cry at work, every time I watch it I notice another heart-breaking detail dissolve into tears all over again.

I’d say I need to stop doing this to myself, but it’s probably the most therapeutic thing I’ve done in a while. I need a good cry over something as trivial as fictional characters every once in a while, since I’m too stubborn to acknowledge when I’m stressed or anxious and deal with it directly.

blog.name: ihsnamih
blog.title: The Girl Who Lived. For Harry Potter.

summary: One day, while reading Harry Potter, I had the urge to know if I have a personal takeaway from it (I mean, even after Harry...
body:
One day, while reading Harry Potter, I had the urge to know if I have a personal takeaway from it (I mean, even after Harry Potter having given me everything already). So, I started Googling every character’s birthday. When I reached Ginny, however, I saw August, and I immediately closed the page. August 11 is my birthday, and I got scared that if her’s is 10th or 12th, that would kill me. But I have always had good gut feelings, if I say so myself, and I also immediately knew it was 11th. I took some courage, I reopened the page and her birthday was 11th August! I still remember, I was walking out of the metro station on the way to office, and I am pretty sure everyone witnessed me floating a little above the road because I was so happy!!!! It’s been some years and, I still feel more happy about sharing my birthday with her than anything else. So, happy birthday, soulmate!

Guess who she ended up marrying?

One day, while reading Harry Potter, I had the urge to know if I have a personal takeaway from it (I mean, even after Harry Potter having given me everything already). So, I started Googling every character’s birthday. When I reached Ginny, however, I saw August, and I immediately closed the page. August 11 is my birthday, and I got scared that if her’s is 10th or 12th, that would kill me. But I have always had good gut feelings, if I say so myself, and I also immediately knew it was 11th. I took some courage, I reopened the page and her birthday was 11th August! I still remember, I was walking out of the metro station on the way to office, and I am pretty sure everyone witnessed me floating a little above the road because I was so happy!!!! It’s been some years and, I still feel more happy about sharing my birthday with her than anything else. So, happy birthday, soulmate!

Guess who she ended up marrying?
trail.content:
One day, while reading Harry Potter, I had the urge to know if I have a personal takeaway from it (I mean, even after Harry Potter having given me everything already). So, I started Googling every character’s birthday. When I reached Ginny, however, I saw August, and I immediately closed the page. August 11 is my birthday, and I got scared that if her’s is 10th or 12th, that would kill me. But I have always had good gut feelings, if I say so myself, and I also immediately knew it was 11th. I took some courage, I reopened the page and her birthday was 11th August! I still remember, I was walking out of the metro station on the way to office, and I am pretty sure everyone witnessed me floating a little above the road because I was so happy!!!! It’s been some years and, I still feel more happy about sharing my birthday with her than anything else. So, happy birthday, soulmate!

blog.name: fougeremalefique
blog.title: PineappleSnape !
blog.description: There’s no need to be nice to become a hero.

summary: I love how antis have no morals when it comes to their faves.
body:
I love how antis have no morals when it comes to their faves.

I just saw a post saying that Sirius’ attempted murder was justified because Severus was being nosy and tried to find a good reason to get them expelled.

Like bitch what d’you think Snape is bullied by these assholes of course he wants them outta the school.

And even if he didn’t have any reasons it doesn’t excuse a fucking attempted murder for Merlin’s sake.
